Diogenes-02.Solution: hit it with a broom five times
Diogenes-02.DeathQuote: (You thought you heard the sound of spilling liquid.)

Diogenes-03.Solution: switch to channel three on a television
Diogenes-03.DeathQuote: (You thought you heard the sound of spilling liquid.)

Diogenes-04.Solution: play clock ticking sounds for six hours
